SEARCH
Package org.bishopireton.hanoi

Class Spindle

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<Disk>
java.util.AbstractList<Disk>
java.util.Vector<Disk>
java.util.Stack<Disk>
org.bishopireton.hanoi.Spindle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Disk>, Collection<Disk>, List<Disk>, RandomAccess, SequencedCollection<Disk>
public class Spindle extends Stack<Disk>
represents a spindle for the towers of hanoi as a stack of disks
Author:
Mrs. Kelly
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Spindle

      public Spindle(int spindle, int numDisks)
      creates a spindle with the correct number of disks sets the color to a random color and creates the disks
      Parameters:
      spindle - spindle number ensures the spindle is located in the right place with the correct number of disks
      numDisks - number of disks the spindle should start with
